title: Paradigm Chronicles Issue 02
summary: This newsletter highlights Drugparadigm's new ABFormer deep learning model for Antibody-Drug Conjugates (ADCs), Cyberparadigm's "Let Us Hack" hands-on training platform, and Roboparadigm's technical process for upgrading the OpenMANIPULATOR-X to a 6 Degrees of Freedom robotic arm.

highlights.title: ADCs
highlights.description: Drugparadigm introduced ABFormer, a new deep learning model for predicting Antibody-Drug Conjugates (ADCs) activity, which showed consistent outperformance against the previous ADCNet model in evaluation metrics

highlights.title: Hands-On Training Platform
highlights.description: Cyberparadigm detailed "Let Us Hack," its hands-on cybersecurity training platform designed with gamified progression and instance-based challenges
